**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 241 1.1 **Tradition** [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3) **Deities** [Angradd](/Deities.aspx?ID=444), [Mephistopheles](/Deities.aspx?ID=400), [Ydajisk](/Deities.aspx?ID=554) **Range** 30 feet **Target** 1 creature **Defense** Will --- A heap of insults and invectives spew from your mouth—words so devastating your foes burn from the intensity of your diatribe. Your words deal 2d6 [persistent fire damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29), and the target must attempt a Will save. If the target doesn't understand the language or you're not speaking a language, it gains a +4 circumstance bonus to its save. **Critical Success** The target is unaffected.
**Success** The target takes half the persistent fire damage.
**Failure** The target becomes [frightened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=76) and takes the full persistent fire damage.
**Critical Failure** The target becomes frightened 2 and takes double the persistent fire damage. --- **Heightened (+2)** You can target two additional creatures, and the persistent damage increases by 2d6.
